description:
When people in Philidelphia and the surrounding counties, are injured in construction accidents, car collisions, or truck crashes, they often require the assistance of a trustworthy attorney. At Stampone Law, we offer free initial consultations to gain a better insight into the details surrounding clients’ matters. For over 30 years, our law office has successfully litigated a wide range of personal injury cases and obtained maximum compensation for our clients. Our legal team is dedicated to serving people in matters involving workplace injuries, construction site accidents, slip-and-fall accidents, wrongful death, asbestos exposure, nursing home abuse, medical malpractice, liquor liability and traumatic brain injury.

Joseph P. Stampone, the founder of our law office, is a member of the American Bar Association and the Pennsylvania Bar Association, in addition to other prestigious organizations. He was given Avvo’s top rating of Superb, and was named among the Top 100 Lawyers by the American Association for Justice. With a passion for the law, Mr. Stampone created a strong legal team composed of experienced attorneys and compassionate staff members to ensure the best interests of each client.

At Stampone Law, we have a track record of success, which includes winning multimillion-dollar settlements for valued clients who chose us to represent their case. Our law office represents businesses and individuals through mediation, civil negotiations and aggressive litigation.
